short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Toggle the time tracker when you start and stop working!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Timepilot is a way to measure timespans you're working on a project! Install a simple on/off-toggle button onto your mobile phone or web browser, and don't ever again worry about writing down your hours on loose notes! Timepilot also supports cooperation where your working schedule is shared among the team members.

This browser extension creates a toggle button for your account at timepilot.nl.
